column4: Is there any way how to turn on DMA and 32bit transfer in feisty?

it's not working in feisty :( cause the developers thought it's better to show all devices as sata. Now everytime I run hdparm I got an error  - HDIO_GETGEO failed: Inappropriate ioctl for device. On ubuntuforums there're a lot unanswered threads :(
